main event: Two unidentified flying objects were sighted circling over the mountains near Albuquerque, New Mexico, on 28 May 1952.
interesting points: The objects were observed approaching at high speed of about 450 mph., The sighting lasted for about 6-10 minutes., The objects were described as coming in from the northeast and making a circular course., There are conflicting conclusions suggesting they could be balloons or aircraft., A prior report on 21 May 1952 mentioned three silver disk-like objects circling over the mountains.
